commentaries.bbcode: [b]Six! [/b]Down on one knee and that's a monster! What a shot over mid-wicket

message.text: Six! Down on one knee and that's a monster! What a shot over mid-wicket

commentaries.bbcode: [b]HD Ackerman: [/b][i]"Russell's playing one of those innings where he smashes it or misses it"[/i]

message.text: HD Ackerman: "Russell's playing one of those innings where he smashes it or misses it"

commentaries.bbcode: [b]50 for Andre Russell[/b]\nFour! Russell brings up his 50 with yet another boundary! Clubbed down to long on, where the fielder can't get across in time. What an exceptional innings this has been!

message.text:
50 for Andre Russell
Four! Russell brings up his 50 with yet another boundary! Clubbed down to long on, where the fielder can't get across in time. What an exceptional innings this has been!

commentaries.bbcode: [b]Six! [/b]It's becoming a KKR cakewalk! Perera goes for the yorker, misses it, and the ball's taken a tourist guide around the MCA International Stadium!

commentaries.bbcode: [b]Dropped! [/b]I've seen it all at this IPL - Glenn Maxwell's dropped a dolly! Russell hits this high into the Pune night sky, Maxwell sets himself, but it doesn't stick!

message.text: Dropped! I've seen it all at this IPL - Glenn Maxwell's dropped a dolly! Russell hits this high into the Pune night sky, Maxwell sets himself, but it doesn't stick!

commentaries.title: M14: KXIP vs KKR – Andre Russell Six

commentaries.bbcode: Strategic Timeout time, and KKR are cruising at the moment. These two just need to play it sensibly and they should see the side home.

message.text: Strategic Timeout time, and KKR are cruising at the moment. These two just need to play it sensibly and they should see the side home.
